translation: 肢体伤害抗性+50，爆炸抗性+25
肢体伤害抗性+40，爆炸抗性+20
肢体伤害抗性+30，爆炸抗性+15
肢体伤害抗性+20，爆炸抗性+10

original: Use INI config file for mod settings. If this is the first time activating INI use, make sure to save the settings to populate the INI file, either by clicking the manual save option or by setting the save mode to Auto.
translation: 使用INI配置文件进行mod设置。若这是第一次激活使用INI，请确保通过单击手动保存选项或将保存模式设置为自动来保存设置以填充INI文件。

original: Auto-load saved INI settings on any new or saved games. Be sure to save the settings to populate the INI file first prior to using this feature.
translation: 在任何新游戏或已保存的游戏上自动加载已保存的INI设置。在使用此功能之前，请确保先保存设置以填充INI文件。

original: Choose between Auto or Manual save modes. If set to Auto, the settings will be automatically saved to INI when pause menu is closed and returned to the game.
translation: 选择使用“自动”或“手动”保存模式。如设置为“自动”，当暂停菜单关闭并返回游戏时，设置将自动保存到INI。

original: Manually save settings to INI file.
Manually load settings from INI file.
Offset movement speed to remove speed gained from increased character scale. Note that this can slow down the speed of the directional movements noticeably so it may or may not be desirable.
translation: 移动速度抵消移除了角色大小比例变化所提高的移动速度。请注意，这会显著降低定向运动的速度，故请视游戏内具体情况决定是否开启。

original: Offset jump height to remove jump height gained from increased character scale. Note that this is an adjustment to the global jump height setting so it may or may not be desirable.
translation: 跳跃高度抵消移除了角色大小比例变化所提高的跳跃高度。请注意，这是对全局跳跃高度设置的调整，故请视游戏内具体情况决定是否开启。

original: Hide weapon backpacks such as ones that come with miniguns and flamers when wearing power armor.
translation: 隐藏武器背包，如穿上动力装甲时附带的旋转机枪和喷火器背包。
调整第一人称步枪机瞄

original: Move fingers out of the way when aiming down sight in 1st person. This is an animation override based on the default animations. Leave this option off if 1st person rifle animation mods are being used.
translation: 在第一人称使用精确瞄准时将手指移开。此动画将覆盖基础动画。如正在使用第一人称步枪动画模组请保持该选项关闭。

original: Hide holstered weapon when wearing power armor.
translation: 穿着动力装甲时隐藏放入枪套的武器。

original: Disable the smoke coming out of the back of Red Glare.
translation: 禁用红色风暴后方出现的烟雾。

original: Determine whether or not blood splatters on screen when being attacked.
translation: 确认被攻击时屏幕上是否会溅上血迹。

original: Determine whether or not explosions (and only explosions) cause camera shake.
translation: 确认爆炸(仅爆炸)是否会引起摄像机震动。

original: Global switch between the New Vegas quick fire and the original TTW/FO3/Pre-Patch animations. This option also determines which variant the Titans minigun animation set uses. If odd issues occur in 1st person, ie barrel doesn't spin, use one of the Scripted options instead. Compatibility options can be used with other minigun animation mods.
translation: 在新维加斯的快速开火和原始TTW/FO3/与修补动画之间进行全局切换。该选项也用于确定泰坦旋转机枪使用的动画集。如果第一人称出现枪管无法旋转等问题，请使用脚本类选项进行替换。兼容类选项可以同其它旋转机枪动画一起使用。

original: This option is for matching the minigun attack sound and animation. Leave this at Default if the sound is already correct or minigun sound mods are being used.
translation: 该选项用于匹配旋转机枪的攻击声音与动画。如果声音正常或使用旋转机枪声音模组请保持默认设置。

original: Enable water breathing when wearing both power armor and helmet.
translation: 同时穿戴动力装甲与头盔时启用水下呼吸。

original: Power armor movement speed when submerged in water.
translation: 动力装甲在水下的移动速度。

original: Enable time notifications for Limited Water Breathing.
translation: 为有限水下呼吸启用时间提示。

original: Enable power armor water recycling system that replenishes a percentage of water loss every 5 minutes, similar to the Vault 13 Canteen. Out of Hardcore Mode, only health points are restored.
translation: 启用动力装甲水循环系统，每5分钟补充一定比例的水分损失，类似于13号避难所水壶的功能。在硬核模式外只能回复生命值。

original: The amount of water loss converted to drinkable water every 5 minutes. The amount is scaled to the dehydration rate.
translation: 失去的水分每5分钟转化为饮用水的量。转换量根据脱水速率进行缩放。

original: Dehydration threshold that prevents power armor from recycling water when reached.
translation: 到达脱水阈值时阻止动力装甲继续水循环。

original: The amount of health points restored when drinking from the power armor recycling system.
translation: 动力装甲水循环系统回复的生命值。

original: Enable power armor gameplay changes. It is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED to turn on the NPC Perks option (uNPCPerks) in JIP LN NVSE, otherwise NPCs won't be affected by some of the custom effects.
translation: 启用动力护甲游戏玩法更改。强烈建议在JIP LN NVSE中打开NPC Perks选项（uNPCPerks），否则NPC不会受到某些自定义效果的影响。

original: Enable immunity against knockbacks and/or knockdowns caused by explosions and melee strikes. Please note that this change is persistent and save baked.
translation: 免疫爆炸及近战造成的击退和/或击倒。请注意，这项改变是永久性的和存档烘焙的。

original: Enable improved general damage resistance on power armors.
translation: 启用动力装甲对一般伤害的抗性提高。

original: Power armor damage resistance multiplier. This multiplier can be used to scale and customize both Default and Improved DR values.
translation: 动力装甲伤害抗性倍率。此倍率可用于调整缩放伤害抗性默认值和伤害抗性提高值。

original: Enable improved general damage threshold on power armors.
translation: 启用动力装甲对一般伤害的伤害减免提高。

original: Power armor damage threshold multiplier. This multiplier can be used to scale and customize both Default and Improved DT values.
translation: 动力装甲伤害减免倍率。此倍率可用于调整缩放伤害减免默认值和伤害减免提高值。

original: Enable improved power armor item condition. Please note that item conditions are saved as flat values rather than as percentages, so disabling this option can cause certain power armor items to have above 100% condition and inflated value.
translation: 启用动力装甲物品状况提高。请注意，物品耐久保存为固定值而非百分比，故禁用此选项可能会导致某些动力装甲物品耐久值膨胀并超过100%。

original: Power armor item condition multiplier. This multiplier can be used to scale and customize both Default and Improved item condition values.
translation: 动力装甲物品耐久倍率。此倍率可用于调整缩放物品耐久默认值和物品耐久提高值。

original: Enable improved armor effects that add layered resistances and new abilities, either with Agility penalty for vanilla game, Sneak penalty for JSawyer Ultimate, or no penalty.
translation: 启用提高装甲效果，添加分层阻力和新能力，包括针对原版游戏的敏捷惩罚，针对JSawyer终极版的潜行惩罚，或选择无惩罚。

original: Enable resistance to limb damage, similar to the perk Adamantium Skeleton, and optionally the ability to ignore the effects of crippled limbs. The latter effect is displayed as 'Ignore Negative Effects' in the item effects panel. (Requires Armor Effects)
translation: 启用肢体伤害抗性提高，效果类似于艾德曼金属骨架Perk且可选择无视肢体残疾的影响。后一种效果在项目效果面板中显示为“无视负面影响”。（需要护甲效果）

original: Enable classic style Strength bonus on power armors. (Requires Armor Effects)
translation: 启用动力装甲经典风格力量加成。(需要装甲效果)

original: Enable energy resistance on power armors. (Requires Armor Effects)
translation: 启用动力装甲能量抗性。(需要装甲效果)

original: Enable Perception bonus on power helmets. (Requires Armor Effects)
translation: 启用动力头盔感知加成。(需要装甲效果)

original: Enable fire resistance on power armors. (Requires Armor Effects)
translation: 启用动力装甲火焰抗性。(需要装甲效果)

original: Enable enhanced accuracy and reduced weapon spread on power helmets. (Requires Armor Effects)
translation: 启用动力头盔精度增强和武器散布减少。(需要装甲效果)

original: Enable poison resistance on power armors. (Requires Armor Effects)
translation: 启用动力装甲毒素抗性。(需要装甲效果)

original: Enable critical chance bonus on power helmets. (Requires Armor Effects)
translation: 启用动力头盔暴击概率加成。(需要装甲效果)

original: Enable explosive resistance on power armors. (Requires Armor Effects)
translation: 启用动力装甲爆炸抗性。(需要装甲效果)

original: Enable bonus action points on power helmets. (Requires Armor Effects)
translation: 启用动力头盔行动点数加成。(需要装甲效果)

original: Integrate wrist-bound Pip-Boy into power armor. Disable this option if using other Pip-Boy mods (Pip-Boy Autohide in UPBC, Hand Held Models, No PipBoy in Power Armor, etc).
translation: 将腕带型哔哔小子和动力装甲一体化。如正在使用其它哔哔小子模组(如UPBC内自动隐藏哔哔小子，手持类模型，动力装甲内无哔哔小子等)请禁用该选项。
手持型哔哔小子兼容性

original: If using a hand held Pip-Boy, enable this option to deactivate Pip-Boy related scripts.
translation: 如正在使用手持型哔哔小子，请启用此选项以停用与哔哔小子有关的脚本。
选择腕带型哔哔小子模型种类

original: If Pip-Boy is out of position, manually let this option to the type of Pip-Boy equipped for proper alignment. Leave this on Auto-Detect if using Pip-Boy 2000.
translation: 如哔哔小子错位，请手动将此选项设置为与装备的哔哔小子相匹配的类型。如使用哔哔小子2000，请将此选项保持为“自动检测”。

original: Hide Pip-Boy Glove In Power Armor
translation: 动力装甲内隐藏哔哔小子手套

original: Hide Pip-Boy glove when wearing power armor. Disable this option if using other means of Pip-Boy glove removal (IE Universal Pip-Boy Customization) and/or using gloves added by mods.
translation: 穿着动力装甲时隐藏哔哔小子手套。如正在使用其它移除哔哔小子手套(如IE通用哔哔小子自定义)和/或添加手套的模组请禁用此选项。

original: Click this to equip Pip-Boy Glove. A glove will automatically be added if it is missing.
translation: 点击以装备哔哔小子手套。若手套丢失将自动添加。

original: Click this to unequip Pip-Boy Glove. The glove will simply be unequipped and won't be removed from the inventory.
translation: 点击以取下哔哔小子手套。手套只是被取下而不会从物品栏内消失。

original: Click this to reset Pip-Boy if the Pip-Boy menu is completely blocked by power armor when accessed. Use in either 1st or 3rd person view while Pip-Boy is not held up.
translation: 点击以重置哔哔小子。访问哔哔小子菜单时被动力装甲阻挡，在第一或第三人称下哔哔小子无法举起时均可使用。

original: Enable footstep, jumping, and landing sound effects when wearing power armor. Contextual sound mode allows for terrain-based sound variations and offers the most customization options.
translation: 穿着动力装甲时，启用脚步、跳跃和落地音效。环境声音模式允许基于地形的声音变化，并提供最多的自定义选项。

original: Global volume level of all power armor sounds.
translation: 所有动力装甲全局音量水平。

original: Volume level of player power armor sounds in 1st person.
translation: 玩家动力装甲第一人称音量水平。

original: Mute player power armor sounds in 1st person.
translation: 禁用玩家动力装甲第一人称声音。

original: Volume level of player power armor sounds in 3rd person.
translation: 玩家动力装甲第三人称音量水平。

original: Mute player power armor sounds in 3rd person.
translation: 禁用玩家动力装甲第三人称声音。

original: Volume level of companion power armor sounds.
translation: 同伴动力装甲音量水平。
禁用同伴动力装甲声音。

original: Volume level of NPC power armor sounds.
Enable extra foley sounds such as armor clanking and hydralics sounds when moving.
translation: 启用额外的拟音声效，如移动时的装甲摩擦声和液压系统声。

original: Enable a subtle screen shake effect when moving.
translation: 启用移动时的屏幕震动。

original: Volume of power armor footstep sounds.
Determine the intensity camera shake effects when landing.
translation: 确定着陆时相机抖动效果的强度。

original: Volume of power armor jumping sounds.
translation: 动力装甲跳跃时的音量。

original: Halve the falloff radius of footstep sounds.
translation: 将脚步声的衰减半径减半。

original: Volume of power armor landing sounds.
translation: 动力装甲落地时的音量。

original: Use painted textures for NCR Salvaged Power Armor and Helmet.
translation: NCR的回收动力装甲使用带涂装的纹理。

original: Double Pauldrons for Scorched Sierra Power Armor
translation: 塞拉动力装甲两侧肩甲

original: Use alternative Sierra Power Armor model that replaces the taxidermied bear with armor pauldron.
translation: 使用塞拉动力装甲的替换模型，将熊头动物标本替换为肩甲。

original: Enable blue color scheme for Brotherhood of Steel power armors.
translation: 为钢铁兄弟会动力装甲启用蓝色配色方案。

original: Enable classic Fallout 1 style dark green model for factionless T51b power armor.
translation: 为无阵营标记的T51b动力装甲启用经典辐射1风格的暗绿色模型。

original: Enable power armor sprint animation for Just Vanilla Sprint mod.
translation: 为JVS启用动力装甲冲刺动画。

original: Enable the power armor animation set for unarmed weapons.
translation: 为徒手武器启用动力装甲动画集。

original: Enable the power armor animation set for grenades.
translation: 为手雷启用动力装甲动画集。

original: Enable the power armor animation set for two-handed melee weapons.
translation: 为双手近战武器启用动力装甲动画集。

original: Enable the power armor animation set for pistols and SMGs.
translation: 为手枪和冲锋枪启用动力装甲动画集。
旋转机枪空闲枪套动画

original: Use alternate holstered idle animations for minigun type weapons when wearing power armor.
translation: 穿着动力装甲时为旋转机枪类武器使用备用的空闲枪套内武器动画。

original: Enable the power armor animation set for small rifles that use 2HA (Two-Handed Automatic) animations, which includes most small to medium sized, semi-auto and automatic rifles, shotguns, and plasma rifles.
translation: 为使用2HA（双手自动）动画的小型步枪启用动力装甲动画集，包括大多数中小型半自动和自动步枪、霰弹枪和等离子步枪。

original: Enable the power armor animation set for minigun type weapons, requires Minigun Holstered Idle.
translation: 为旋转机枪类武器启用动力装甲动画集。需要旋转机枪空闲枪套动画。

original: Enable the power armor animation set for small rifles that use 2HR (Two-Handed Rifle) animations, which includes lever-action rifles, caravan shotguns, laser rifles, and grenade rifles.
translation: 为使用2HR（双手步枪）动画的小型步枪启用动力装甲动画集，包括杠杆式步枪、商队霰弹枪、激光步枪和榴弹步枪。
旋转机枪机械瞄准器(仅限玩家)

original: Enable player-only 3rd person iron sight animations for minigun type weapons, requires Minigun Animation Set.
translation: 启用仅限玩家的旋转机枪类第三人称机械瞄准器动画，需要旋转机枪动画集。

original: Enable the power armor animation set for big two-handed rifles, such as sniper rifles, anti-material rifles, gauss rifles, hunting rifles, pump-action rifles, and other battle rifles that cannot be held in one hand.
translation: 启用大型双手步枪动力装甲动画集，如狙击步枪、反器材步枪、高斯步枪、猎枪、泵动步枪和其他不能单手握持的战斗步枪。

original: Enable the power armor animation set for shoulder mounted weapons, such as SMMGs, missile launchers, and tesla cannons.
translation: 启用肩扛武器动力装甲动画集，如SMMG、导弹发射器和特拉斯火炮。
林登的放逐者动力装甲
有限水下呼吸 - 剩余60秒
有限水下呼吸 - 剩余30秒
有限水下呼吸 - 剩余10秒
有限水下呼吸 - 剩余5秒

original: You lean in to examine the stasis pod, and the force field is responding to your power armor, gradually fading more and more, the closer you get. \n\nYou reach out and touch the force field, and in an instant, it shuts down, leaving its contents free for the taking.
translation: 你走上前去检查停滞舱，力场对你的动力装甲有所反应，你靠得越近力场就越弱。\n\n在你伸出手触摸力场的瞬间，它关闭了，里面的东西唾手可得。

original:
Unlike the rest of the power armors stored in the bunker, this specialized variant is fitted with Tesla coils.

You try to find a way to open the stasis pod but to no avail. It is securely sealed shut.

ED-E moves in to help out and accesses a hidden terminal on the side. After a brief moment, the robot comes back with a helpful discovery.

It appears that this particular stasis pod has been configured to only grant access to Enclave personels, but a security override was left in for anybody in a full suit of advanced power armor.
translation:
与地堡中储存的其他动力装甲不同，这种特殊的变体安装了特斯拉线圈。

你试图找到打开停滞舱的方法，但没有成功。力场被安全地封闭，而打开的方式已经超出了你的科技水平。

ED-E过来帮忙，访问了侧面的一个隐藏终端。过了一会儿，它带回来了一个好消息。

貌似这个特殊的停滞舱被设置为只允许英克雷人员进入，但任何穿着全套高级动力装甲的人都通过安保优先级使用。
有限水下呼吸 - 已结束

original:
You lean in to examine the stasis pod, and the force field is responding to your power armor, gradually fading more and more, the closer you get. 

The moment you touch the force field itself however, it powers back up fully, preventing entry.

Maybe the key lies with the missing power helmet to your power armor.
translation:
你走上前去检查停滞舱，力场对你的动力装甲有所反应，你靠得越近力场就越弱。

然而当你接触到力场本体时，它却完全恢复了能量阻止你进入。

也许关键就在于你的动力装甲少了一顶头盔。

original: You drink from your power armor recycled water reservoir...
translation: 你从动力装甲水循环箱里喝了口水...

original: You drink from your power armor recycled water reservoir. The water tastes slightly questionable but it quenches your thirst nonetheless...
translation: 你从动力装甲水循环箱里喝了口水。这水的味道有些可疑，但毕竟能解渴就行...

original: You are too dehydrated to produce the resources needed by your power armor recycling system...
translation: 你的脱水程度太高，无法产生动力装甲循环系统需要的资源...

original:
Unlike the rest of the power armors stored in the bunker, this specialized variant is fitted with Tesla coils.

You try to find a way to open the stasis pod but to no avail. The force field is securely sealed shut, in a way that is beyond your technological knowledge to pry open.

Maybe someone, or something, that is more familiar with this kind of engineering can help out.
translation:
与地堡中储存的其他动力装甲不同，这种特殊的变体安装了特斯拉线圈。

你试图找到打开停滞舱的方法，但没有成功。力场被安全地封闭，而打开的方式已经超出了你的科技水平。

也许某个人，或是某个东西对此非常熟悉，可以为你提供帮助。

original: Titans of The New West: Mod settings auto-saved to INI.
translation: 新西部泰坦：模组设置已自动保存至INI文件中。

original: Titans of The New West: 'Pip-Boy Integration' option has been automatically disabled due to missing Pip-Boy. If you wish to use this feature, equip Pip-Boy or disable mods that permanently unequip Pip-Boy (ie. No Pip-Boy in Power Armor), then reenable the option in the Mod Configuration Menu.
translation: 新西部泰坦：哔哔小子丢失故自动禁用“集成型哔哔小子”选项。若想使用该功能请先装备哔哔小子或禁用移除哔哔小子的模组（即No Pip-Boy in Power Armor），然后在模组配置菜单中重新启用该选项。

original: Titans of The New West: Currently equipped power armor does not support Pip-Boy integration. It is recommended to turn off the mod option when using this armor to avoid unintended results.
translation: 新西部泰坦：当前装备的动力装甲不支持集成型哔哔小子。建议在使用该装甲时关闭此模组选项以免引起不必要的意外。
